text: Jun manu logote kan ase, Atma pora girja khan ke ki koi ase etu huni bhi. Kun manu sob to pari kene jiti loi, taike Moi jibon laga ghas pora khabole nimite dibo, juntu Isor laga Paradise2.7 Paradise to sob kisim ghas thaka ekta dangor aru sundur bagan thakise, aru etu ke Paradise mati loise. Luke 23.43; 2 Cor. 12.3. te ase2.7 Paradise..”’”
